CustomField.description: There are two unique fields on ZP_Adjustments__c. One is a prefixed version of the other. We use the numerical one here, as that is a unique identifier, though not a global identifier across objects. This field is unique because we apply the same adjustment to all open Payroll Opportunities for a given product.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Field for noting the ZP Adjustment record that made this record. Used only for data migration, not for triggered updates.
CustomField.label: ZP Adjustment Id
